channel.title: HYDRANS – pass me by (Experimental Future Bass)
channel.description:
Hey everyone! :wave:
Hope everyone had a great Thanksgiving! We're excited to announce Frontier's latest release, **pass me by** by HYDRANS. (@HYDRANS) For those of you who don't know, HYDRANS is a talented and quickly-growing Auxy producer who is currently in the process of releasing his debut LP "Insurgency".
Click the cover art or the links below to listen. Make sure to leave a like / comment, and repost if you enjoyed! :yellow_heart:
[![HYDRANS|200x200](upload://fSp40UnUs24IWNFSiPkZ50zqGLJ.jpeg)](https://soundcloud.com/wearefrontier/passmeby)
Stream on **SoundCloud**: https://soundcloud.com/wearefrontier/passmeby Visualizer on **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6RtFRl95Vh8
–
Follow **HYDRANS**: https://soundcloud.com/hydrans Follow **Frontier**: https://soundcloud.com/wearefrontier
Spotify & Apple Music coming soon. Stay tuned!

item.title: HYDRANS – pass me by (Experimental Future Bass)
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
It’s actually so goooood! I love it!
